'''Alva Nikola''' was a historical figure in [[Sumeru]] and one of [[Sumeru Akademiya]]'s distinguished graduates.

==Story==
While at Sumeru Akademiya, Alva Nikola researched how [[Electro Abyss Mage]]s manipulated [[Electro]] and with this knowledge, developed a theoretical weapon dubbed the Nikola Coil. However, his research was lost, ostensibly to a fungal infection.<ref>{{Ref/Enemy|Electro Abyss Mage}}</ref>

One of his quotes is listed on the [[Bimarstan's Proverb Column]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Alva Nikola's surname is derived from {{w|Nikola Tesla}}, a Serbian-American inventor and engineer best known for his work in developing the alternating current (AC) electricity supply system. The Nikola Coil is a reference to Tesla's {{w|Tesla coil}}.
* Alva Nikola's given name may be derived from the middle name of {{w|Thomas Alva Edison}}, an American inventor known for creating early versions of the light bulb and compared to Tesla so often that {{w|Thomas Edison in popular culture|popular culture often portrays them as adversaries}}.<!--
